    • Method Detail

      • createMessage

        public Conversation createMessage(org.json.JSONObject params)
                           throws java.io.IOException
        Send a new outbound message
        Parameters:
        params - JSONObject to hold all params.
        params.type - String Type of conversation. Possible value(s) - sms. Check conversation.types for more options
        params.senderAddress - String Sender address information, basically the from address. E164 formatted DID number passed as a value, which is owned by the user. If the user wants to let CPaaS uses the default assigned DID number, this field can either has "default" value or the same value as the userId.
        params.destinationAddress - Array[String] | String Indicates which DID number(s) used as destination for this SMS.
        params.message - String SMS text message
        Returns:
        Conversation
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Exception raised

      • getMessagesInThread

        public Conversation getMessagesInThread(org.json.JSONObject params)
                                 throws java.io.IOException
        Read all messages in a thread
        Parameters:
        params - JSONObject to hold all params.
        params.type - String Type of conversation. Possible value(s) - sms. Check conversation.types for more options
        params.remoteAddress - String Optional Remote address information while retrieving the SMS history, basically the destination telephone number that user exchanged SMS before. E164 formatted DID number passed as a value.
        params.localAddress - String Optional Local address information while retrieving the SMS history, basically the source telephone number that user exchanged SMS before.
        params.query - JSONObject Optional
        params.query.name - String Optional Performs search operation on firstName and lastName fields.
        params.query.firstName - String Optional Performs search for the firstName field of the directory items.
        params.query.lastName - String Optional Performs search for the lastName field of the directory items.
        params.query.userName - String Optional Performs search for the userName field of the directory items.
        params.query.phoneNumber - String Optional Performs search for the fields containing a phone number, like businessPhoneNumber, homePhoneNumber, mobile, pager, fax.
        params.query.order - String Optional Ordering the contact results based on the requested sortBy value, order query parameter should be accompanied by sortBy query parameter.
        params.query.sortBy - String Optional SortBy value is used to detect sorting the contact results based on which attribute. If order is not provided with that, ascending order is used.
        params.query.max - Integer Optional Maximum number of contact results that has been requested from CPaaS for this query.
        params.query.next - String Optional Pointer for the next chunk of contacts, should be gathered from the previous query results.
        Returns:
        Conversation
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Exception raised

      • deleteMessage

        public Conversation deleteMessage(org.json.JSONObject params)
                           throws java.io.IOException
        Delete conversation message
        Parameters:
        params - JSONObject to hold all params.
        params.type - String Type of conversation. Possible value(s) - sms. Check conversation.types for more options
        params.localAddress - String Local address information while retrieving the SMS history, basically the source telephone number that user exchanged SMS before.
        params.remoteAddress - String Remote address information while retrieving the SMS history, basically the destination telephone number that user exchanged SMS before. E164 formatted DID number passed as a value.
        params.messageId - String Optional Identification of the SMS message. If messageId is not passed then the SMS thread is deleted with all messages.
        Returns:
        Conversation
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Exception raised

      • getMessages

        public Conversation getMessages(org.json.JSONObject params)
                         throws java.io.IOException
        Gets all messages.
        Parameters:
        params - JSONObject to hold all params.
        params.type - String Type of conversation. Possible value(s) - sms. Check conversation.types for more options
        params.localAddress - String Local address information while retrieving the SMS history, basically the source telephone number that user exchanged SMS before.
        params.remoteAddress - String Remote address information while retrieving the SMS history, basically the destination telephone number that user exchanged SMS before. E164 formatted DID number passed as a value.
        params.query - JSONObject Optional
        params.query.max - Integer Optional Number of messages that is requested from CPaaS.
        params.query.next - String Optional Pointer for the next page to retrieve for the messages, provided by CPaaS in previous GET response.
        params.query.new - String Optional Filters the messages or threads having messages that are not received by the user yet
        params.query.lastMessageTime - Integer Optional Filters the messages or threads having messages that are sent/received after provided Epoch time
        Returns:
        Conversation
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Exception raised

      • getStatus

        public Conversation getStatus(org.json.JSONObject params)
                       throws java.io.IOException
        Read a conversation message status
        Parameters:
        params - JSONObject to hold all params.
        params.type - String Type of conversation. Possible value(s) - sms. Check conversation.types for more options
        params.localAddress - String Local address information while retrieving the SMS history, basically the source telephone number that user exchanged SMS before.
        params.remoteAddress - String Remote address information while retrieving the SMS history, basically the destination telephone number that user exchanged SMS before. E164 formatted DID number passed as a value.
        params.messageId - String Identification of the SMS message.
        Returns:
        Conversation
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Exception raised

        public Conversation getSubscription(org.json.JSONObject params)
                             throws java.io.IOException
        Read active subscription
        Parameters:
        params - JSONObject to hold all params.
        params.type - String Type of conversation. Possible value(s) - sms. Check conversation.types for more options
        params.subscriptionId - String Resource ID of the subscription
        Returns:
        Conversation
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Exception raised

      • subscribe

        public Conversation subscribe(org.json.JSONObject params)
                       throws java.io.IOException
        Create a new subscription
        Parameters:
        params - JSONObject to hold all params.
        params.type - String Type of conversation. Possible value(s) - sms. Check conversation.types for more options
        params.webhookURL - String HTTPS URL that is present in your application server which is accessible from the public web where the notifications should be sent to. Note: Should be a POST endpoint.
        params.destinationAddress - String optional The address that incoming messages are received for this subscription. If does not exist, CPaaS uses the default assigned DID number to subscribe against. It is suggested to provide the intended E164 formatted DID number within this parameter.
        Returns:
        Conversation
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Exception raised

      • unsubscribe

        public Conversation unsubscribe(org.json.JSONObject params)
                         throws java.io.IOException
        Unsubscription from conversation notification
        Parameters:
        params - JSONObject to hold all params.
        params.subscriptionId - String Resource ID of the subscription
        Returns:
        Conversation
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Exception raised
